title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, even if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value, and the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the chart configuration.
2. Enter a blank value for the localization key when adding the chart.
3. Save the changes and observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
